Articles.Content: If you EVA with time warp left on (by accident) you will find out that animations (like planting the flag) will desync (jeb will do the flag planting animation, but the flag pole will lag behind by 3 seconds) and after this, you wont be able to move the kerbal at all, it will take switching vehicles and all sorts of things. I also found that if you landed on the a planet, (I was in EVA at the time) and press F9, (I have no idea what it does exactly but it restarts the whole intro animation with PAIGE) it will end up deleting basically every vehicle, when I opened tracking station, I found all my kerbals which were on "long term missions" back on kerbin, and all my rockets out in space, gone. I Finally was able to land on the mun for the first time ever, then jeb got frozen, then I pressed f9, and that was a real push away from this game, hoping F9 gets fixed, lovely game, excited to see what you have in store for us next.
